description:
The castle which had been Hazuki`s cage for so long appears, summoned by her acceptance of her fate. Yayoi, Hikaru, and Haiji follow her in while Gramps and Elfriede struggle to keep the castle from leaving.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good-bye Big Brother... I`m Going Back? I`m Really Going Back?
Sayonara Onii-sama...... Watashi Honto ni Kaecchau yo? Kaecchau yo?
サヨナラ, おにいさま...... 私, ホントに帰っちゃうよ?帰っちゃうよ?
